overview:
Marina Tognetti is an experienced senior executive founder/CEO of Myngle.

Marina has 18 years of professional experience in consumer goods marketing and business development by Procter & Gamble, Philips, Sara Lee; strategy consulting by the Boston Consulting Group and e-commerce / technology by eBay. Marina lived and worked in Italy, France and the Netherlands, is a passionate traveler, spent one year backpacking through Asia as well as traveling to many different countries around the world. Marina has an MBA from INSEAD.
